aboutInfo.title: About
aboutInfo.weAre: Martian is a creative development studio in San Francisco

projectHero.copy: We concepted and developed a fully responsive, dynamic platform capable of easily generating and manageing thousands of pages for Marketing.Twitter.com

textColumns.copyLeft: Metagramme is an self-initiated experiment in exploring how patterns emerge from combining visual data over time using public instagram photos and hashtags. What does it look like when you merge the image results for #sadness? Is it representative of society's view of what sadness is?
textColumns.copyRight:
Metagramme is an self-initiated experiment in exploring how patterns emerge from combining visual data over time using public instagram photos and hashtags.

What does it look like when you merge the image results for #sadness? Is it representative of society's view of what sadness is?

projectDetails.projectIntro:
Metagramme is an self-initiated experiment in exploring how patterns emerge from combining visual data over time using public instagram photos and hashtags.

What does it look like when you merge the image results for #sadness? Is it representative of society's view of what sadness is?
